page.title: 09Clubs, New Galloway
page.content: Recreation, mostly, takes the form of clubs. The clubs in New Galloway are as follows:_darts, fishing, golf, badminton, Scottish ornithologists, Women's rural and Women's guild(Church based organisation).Each of the hotels has its own darts team and they compete in the Darts League. There is an excellent golf course and clubhouse to which visitors are welcome.The badminton club is run by locals for locals.Indoor bowls take place in New Galloway but the Green bowlers go to Dalry for a game as the the local green is not in use.The cricketers, also, go to Dalry.The Ornithological society is well attended by both adults and children.60%of the adults are in the clubs. For children, there is a Cub pack locally and a Brownie unit in Dalry.They, also,attend Gymnastics club and football training.
